text: The Beverly Hills Cannabis Club was established by Cheryl Shuman in 1996. She reportedly created the business "to change public perception about marijuana and open the door for legalization". ==See also== *Cannabis in California *Cannabis in the United States ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 establishments in California Category:1996 in cannabis Category:American companies established in 1996 Category:Cannabis companies of the United States Category:Cannabis in California
title: Beverly Hills Cannabis Club
